alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 1:33PM CDT until March 16 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northern Cotton County in southwestern Oklahoma... East central Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 132 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Chattanooga, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southern Lawton, Walters, Geronimo, Chattanooga, Faxon and Hulen. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
